title: Home
description: Stanford Medicine integrates a premier medical school with world-class hospitals to advance human health.
cleaned_text: Celebrating the start of their medical education, students reflect on their motivations for entering the field and pledge to put their patients first. A leader in the biomedical revolution, Stanford Medicine has a long tradition of leadership in pioneering research, creative teaching protocols and effective clinical therapies. A massive study of medical and genetic data shows that people with a particular version of a gene involved in immune response had a lower risk of Alzheimer's and Parkinson's disease. A new, large-scale study of body temperatures has found that "normal" isn't one size fits all — it varies by age, sex, weight, time of day and more.
